deal.title: Semaglutide & Tirzepatide Weight Loss Program with Consultation from WeightCare + FREE Health App (Up to 83% Off!)
deal.announcementTitle: LOSE WEIGHT NOW - Semaglutide & Tirzepatide Program with Consult + App
deal.finePrint:
Purchase Guidelines:

  • Limit 1 per person. Must be 18 or older.
  • Valid only for option purchased—Groupon code will not apply to alternative product.

    • Consultation + Refunds:

  • Telehealth consultation required. Place your order on joinweightcare.com using your Groupon code; complete medical questionnaire. If deemed a candidate for the medication, your doctor will prescribe the starter doses of medication. If you are ineligible, a refund will be provided.

    • Shipping + State Restrictions:

  • $30 shipping not included and will be due upon checkout.
  • Not valid for residents of AK, HI, LA, MS, and Canada.

    • Program Details:

  • Unless canceled with the merchant, the subscription will automatically renew at the regular monthly rate ($399/$249 for Semaglutide Full Dose, $249 Semaglutide Micro-Dose, $499 /$349 for Tirzepatide, $349 Tirzepatide Micro-Dose).
  • For additional support or cancellation, call WeightCare at (954) 852-9344 or email help@joinweightcare.com.

    • Medical Considerations:

  • Semaglutide or Tirzepatide, including micro-dose programs, cannot be prescribed and should not be purchased by individuals with a BMI under 25 (or under 20 for micro-dosing), an eating disorder, diabetes, gallbladder disease, history of drug or alcohol abuse, recent bariatric surgery, pancreatitis, medullary thyroid cancer or a family history of it, diabetic retinopathy, multiple endocrine neoplasia type 2, or those who are pregnant, breastfeeding, or planning to become pregnant. Semaglutide micro-dosing is not intended to treat obesity or diabetes; it may be prescribed to support metabolic balance, digestive regulation, satiety, and portion control.
deal.highlightsHtml: WeightCare offers personalized weight loss programs featuring Semaglutide or Tirzepatide with expert consultation, shipping to your door, a free health app for tracking progress, and unlimited follow-up support. Achieve your goals with physician-supervised programs and care tailored to your needs.
deal.pitchHtml:
Highlights

  • Includes compounded GLP-1 medication: First month of semaglutide or tirzepatide, prescribed and shipped if approved.

  • 100% online telemedicine consultation: Complete your telehealth consultation and medical intake from the comfort of home.

  • Unlimited messaging with your care team: Chat anytime with your WeightCare doctor for guidance, adjustments, or questions.

  • Personalized support from a Member Success Advocate: Get dedicated support and accountability throughout your program.

  • Free WeightCare App included: Track progress, access recipes and workouts, join challenges, and chat with nutritionists and trainers.

Choose the Best Option for You

Tirzepatide Programs

Tirzepatide 4-Week Weight Loss Program

Starter plan for new users beginning treatment. Includes a 10mg vial of medication for 4 weeks.
Dosing to be provided by your doctor.

Tirzepatide Microdosing 4-Week Program (BMI 20–25 Eligible)

Designed for people who are not traditionally candidates for GLP-1s, with a BMI between 20–25.
Includes a 10mg vial of medication for 4 weeks. Dosing to be provided by your doctor.

Semaglutide Programs

Semaglutide 4-Week Weight Loss Program

Introductory 4-week program at the lowest doses to begin your GLP-1 journey.
Dosing to be provided by your doctor.

Semaglutide Microdosing 4-Week Program (BMI 20–25 Eligible)

Designed for people who are not traditionally candidates for GLP-1s, with a BMI between 20–25.
Includes a 1mg vial of medication for 4 weeks. Dosing to be provided by your doctor.

Semaglutide 6-Week Weight Loss Program

Starter program designed to support new users beginning treatment. IIncludes a 2.5mg vial of medication for 6 weeks.
Dosing to be provided by your doctor.

Please note: These Groupon deals are intended for users starting at the lowest doses. If you're already taking semaglutide or tirzepatide at a higher dose, please reach out to the merchant directly to learn about additional options better suited to your current treatment.

BMI Calculator

Enter your height and weight to estimate your BMI.

Enter your details and tap Calculate.

This calculator provides an estimate of your BMI for informational purposes only and may help you understand eligibility for this deal. Results are not medical advice.

Medical Eligibility Required

GLP-1 medications cannot be prescribed to individuals with:

  • BMI under 25 (or under 20 for micro-dosing)
  • Eating disorders
  • Diabetes
  • Gallbladder disease
  • Substance misuse history
  • Recent bariatric surgery
  • Pancreatitis
  • Medullary thyroid cancer (personal/family)
  • Diabetic retinopathy
  • Multiple endocrine neoplasia type 2
  • Pregnant, breastfeeding, or TTC

Micro-dosing programs are not intended to treat obesity or diabetes; they support satiety, appetite control, and metabolic balance.

How It Works

1. Purchase & Redeem

Copy your Groupon code and follow the instructions located on your voucher.

2. Complete Intake Forms

Complete medical intake form and tell your doctor about your health and weight loss goals.

3. Provider Review

A licensed provider evaluates your info and prescribes medication if appropriate.

4. Receive Medication

If eligible, medication and injection supplies are delivered to your door!

If you do not meet eligibility criteria or a prescription cannot be provided, your Groupon voucher will be refunded.

5. Start Your Plan + Get Ongoing Support

Begin weekly injections, track progress in the WeightCare app, and message your provider or care team anytime.

Shipping & State Restrictions

This offer does not include shipping to certain U.S. states.

View the full list here

Cannot be Shipped to the Following States:

  • Alaska
  • Hawaii
  • Louisiana
  • Mississippi

Shipping not available in Canada or outside of US.

FAQs

What’s the difference between semaglutide and tirzepatide?

Both are GLP-1 medications that help regulate appetite and blood sugar. Tirzepatide is a dual-action medication (GLP-1 + GIP) and may lead to faster or more significant weight loss for some users. Your provider can help determine which is right for you, based on your goals and health history.

What's included in the program?

You’ll receive a same-day telehealth consult, prescription medication (if eligible), unlimited messaging with your doctor, monthly check-ins, ongoing support from a member success advocate, and full app access.

How soon will I see results?

Many members begin noticing changes in appetite or eating habits within the first 2–4 weeks. Most weight loss occurs gradually over time, especially as your dose increases and healthy habits take hold. Results vary by individual and medication type.

How long until I receive my medication?

Shipments are sent from an accredited U.S. pharmacy in a small box with ice packs. Expect delivery within 5-7 business days, with tracking provided.

Who is Semaglutide or Tirzepatide Micro-dosing right for?

GLP-1 Micro-dose programs may be appropriate for you if you are:

  • between BMI of 20-25
  • not generally eligible for GLP-1 treatment at higher doses
  • trying to maintain a healthy weight
  • looking to reduce food noise
  • wanting to build healthier patterns
Semaglutide and Tirzepatide Microdosing is not intended to treat obesity or diabetes. This promotion is for the purchase of services and does not constitute the sale of prescription drugs.

legalDisclosures.line1: Promotional value expires 120 days after purchase. Amount paid never expires.
legalDisclosures.line2: Merchant is solely responsible to purchasers for the care and quality of the advertised goods and services.
